tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE competitors_data (
    competitor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    competitor_name STRING,
    product_category STRING,
    product_price DECIMAL,
    market_share DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE competitors (
  competitor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  competitor_name VARCHAR(255),
  industry_category VARCHAR(50),
  revenue DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE market_analysis (
  analysis_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  competitor_id INT,
  analysis_date DATE,
  market_opportunity TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE customer_feedback (
  feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  competitor_id INT,
  feedback_date DATE,
  feedback_text TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE marketing_strategies (
  strategy_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  competitor_id INT,
  strategy_description TEXT,
  implementation_date DATE
)
CREATE TABLE CompetitorProfiles (competitor_id INT PRIMARY KEY, competitor_name VARCHAR(255), industry VARCHAR(100), revenue DECIMAL(15, 2), employee_count INT)
CREATE TABLE ProductCatalog (product_id INT PRIMARY KEY, product_name VARCHAR(255), category VARCHAR(100), price DECIMAL(10, 2), supplier_id INT)
CREATE TABLE CustomerFeedback (feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY, customer_id INT, feedback_text TEXT, rating INT, feedback_date DATE)
CREATE TABLE MarketResearchData (research_id INT PRIMARY KEY, market_segment VARCHAR(100), trend VARCHAR(255), analysis TEXT, research_date DATE)
CREATE TABLE MarketingCampaigns (campaign_id INT PRIMARY KEY, campaign_name VARCHAR(255), start_date DATE, end_date DATE, budget DECIMAL(12, 2), status VARCHAR(20)
